sentences.en: About two-thirds of adults consult their doctor at least once a year.
sentences.cn: 大约三分之二的成年人一年至少看一次医生。

sentences.en: Nearly two-thirds of this group voted for Buchanan.
sentences.cn: 这一组几乎2/3的人将票投给了布坎南。

sentences.en: Do not fill the container more than two-thirds full.
sentences.cn: 加入的量不要超过容器总容量的2/3。
